verses.verse: Then Moab <S%H4124><s%> rebelled <S%H6586><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Ahab. <S%H256><s%>

And Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> fell down <S%H5307><s%> through a lattice <S%H7639><s%> in his upper chamber <S%H5944><s%> that was in Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, and was sick <S%H2470><s%>: and he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3212><s%>, Go, inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baal <S%H1176><s%>–zebub the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> whether I shall recover <S%H2421><s%> of this disease <S%H2483><s%>.

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite <S%H8664><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%>, go up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, and say <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H430><s%>, Is it not because there is not a God in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that you go <S%H1980><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baal <S%H1176><s%>–zebub the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%>?

Now therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, You shall not come down <S%H3381><s%> from that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which you are gone up <S%H5927><s%>, but shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>. And Elijah <S%H452><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%>.
And when the messengers <S%H4397><s%> turned back <S%H7725><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, he said unto them <S%H2088><s%>, Why are you now turned back <S%H7725><s%>?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5927><s%>, There came a man <S%H376><s%> up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> us <S%H559><s%>, and said unto us <S%H3212><s%>, Go, turn again <S%H7725><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> that sent <S%H7971><s%> you <S%H1696><s%>, and say unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Is it not because there is not a God <S%H430><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that you send <S%H7971><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baal <S%H1176><s%>–zebub the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%>? therefore you shall not come down <S%H3381><s%> from that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which you are gone up <S%H5927><s%>, but shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>.
And he said <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H4941><s%>, What manner of man <S%H376><s%> was he which came up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> you <S%H1696><s%>, and told you these words <S%H1697><s%>?

And they answered <S%H559><s%> him <S%H8181><s%>, He was a hairy man <S%H1167><s%>, and wearing <S%H247><s%> a belt <S%H232><s%> of leather <S%H5785><s%> about his body <S%H4975><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, It is Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite <S%H8664><s%>.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto him a captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty <S%H2572><s%>. And he went up <S%H5927><s%> to him <S%H3427><s%>: and, behold, he sat on the top <S%H7218><s%> of an hill <S%H2022><s%>. And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, You man of God <S%H430><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%>, Come down <S%H3381><s%>.

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> to the captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%>, If I be a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, then let fire <S%H784><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and consume <S%H398><s%> you and your fifty <S%H2572><s%>. And there came down <S%H3381><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> him and his fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

Again <S%H7725><s%> also he sent <S%H7971><s%> unto him another <S%H312><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty <S%H2572><s%>. And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, O man of God <S%H430><s%>, thus has the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Come down <S%H3381><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%>.

And Elijah <S%H452><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, If I be a man of God <S%H430><s%>, let fire <S%H784><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and consume <S%H398><s%> you and your fifty <S%H2572><s%>. And the fire <S%H784><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> him and his fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> a captain <S%H8269><s%> of the third <S%H7992><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> with his fifty <S%H2572><s%>. And the third <S%H7992><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> and fell <S%H3766><s%> on his knees <S%H1290><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> Elijah <S%H452><s%>, and begged <S%H2603><s%> him <S%H1696><s%>, and said unto him <S%H376><s%>, O man of God <S%H430><s%>, I pray you <S%H5315><s%>, let my life, and the life <S%H5315><s%> of these fifty <S%H2572><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%>, be precious <S%H3365><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Behold <S%H3381><s%>, there came fire <S%H784><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and burnt up <S%H398><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of the former <S%H7223><s%> fifties <S%H2572><s%> with their fifties <S%H2572><s%>: therefore let my life <S%H5315><s%> now be precious <S%H3365><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto Elijah <S%H452><s%>, Go down <S%H3381><s%> with him <S%H3372><s%>: be not afraid of him <S%H6440><s%>. And he arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> with him unto the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And he said <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Forasmuch as you have sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of Baal <S%H1176><s%>–zebub the god <S%H430><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%>, is it not because there is no God <S%H430><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of his word <S%H1697><s%>? therefore you shall not come down <S%H3381><s%> off that bed <S%H4296><s%> on which you are gone up <S%H5927><s%>, but shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die <S%H4191><s%>.

So he died <S%H4191><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which Elijah <S%H452><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%>. And Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; because he had no son <S%H1121><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?
